sentences.en: Karen complained of hyperactivity and restlessness.
sentences.cn: 卡伦抱怨说自己过分好动和不安宁。

sentences.en: There was a feeling of restlessness deep in her soul.
sentences.cn: 她内心深处感到焦躁不安。

sentences.en: At last would the agonizing restlessness be allayed, which destroys my existence!
sentences.cn: 那种毁灭了我的生命的、令人痛苦的不安的情绪，就终于会消失！
